Job Title: Senior Writer, SEO

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Who We Are üåç

Manychat is a leading Chat Marketing platform. We help businesses engage with their customers on Instagram, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, and Telegram.

Trusted by over 1 million brands in 170+ countries, we're an official Meta Business Partner, backed by top investors, including Bessemer Venture Partners.

With 150+ teammates across international offices in Austin, Barcelona, Yerevan, S√£o Paulo, and Amsterdam ‚Äî Manychat helps businesses across the globe improve their ROI and grow faster.

What We're Looking For üåü

We are seeking a seasoned Senior Writer, SEO who is driven not just by crafting content but by sculpting our blog into a leading voice in the tech, chat marketing, and AI industries. This role demands a tactical thinker with a penchant for data-driven strategies and a knack for optimizing content to outsmart the competition. If you have a history of elevating SEO metrics and are prepared to dive deep into the mechanics of advanced SEO techniques, we want you on our team.

What You'll Do üöÄ

Conduct in-depth research to identify high-impact keywords that boost organic search visibility and engagement.Utilize tools like SEMrush and Google Analytics to track and optimize backlink quality, keyword positioning, and overall SEO health.Execute on-page SEO strategies to enhance content readability and performance, ensuring alignment with Manychat‚Äôs growth objectives.Lead a robust backlink strategy, securing high-quality links through guest blogging, partnerships, influencer collaborations, and other creative non-traditional ways to get backlinks.Develop and manage an SEO dashboard to monitor real-time performance metrics and adjust strategies as needed.Work closely with the PPC and broader marketing team to create strategies that amplify SEO results.Achieve a measurable increase in organic traffic and improve on-page metrics like time on page and bounce rate.Secure top ranking for targeted keywords crucial to boosting visibility and user acquisition.

What You'll Bring üí•

Proven track record of significantly improving SEO metrics, documented through case studies or data-backed results.Innovative SEO tactics adeptness, including familiarity with AI challenges in SEO such as voice search optimization.Strong analytical skills to effectively parse data and derive insightful action plans.Experience in managing SEO across large-scale content platforms.Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively across teams.

What We Offer ü§ó

We care about your growth, well-being, and comfort

Annual professional development reimbursement.Generous time-off policy to balance your work and life.Competitive medical, dental, and vision coverage for you and your dependents (via PLANS).Hybrid work format to choose between home and office.

Manychat is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We‚Äôre committed to building a diverse and inclusive team. We do not discriminate against qualified employees or applicants because of race, color, religion, gender identity, sex, sexual preference, sexual identity, pregnancy, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, marital status, physical disability, mental disability, medical condition, military status, or any other characteristic protected by local law or ordinance.

This commitment is also reflected through our candidate experience. If you have individual needs that may require an accommodation during the interview process, please indicate this in your application. We will do our best to provide assistance throughout your interview process to ensure you‚Äôre set up for success.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
